content: Head back to the Lower Pagoda Shrine, and revisit the Pagoda Realm Prisoner (aka, the Third Prince of Flowing Sands). He will be grateful for your work in putting his captains to rest, and will award you the **Chubai Spearhead** , which allows you to craft a spear variant of your trusty staff: the Chu-Bai Spear!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road' and the sub-subsection 'Completing the Pagoda Prisoner's Quest'.
The content is as follows:
Head back to the Lower Pagoda Shrine, and revisit the Pagoda Realm Prisoner (aka, the Third Prince of Flowing Sands). He will be grateful for your work in putting his captains to rest, and will award you the **Chubai Spearhead** , which allows you to craft a spear variant of your trusty staff: the Chu-Bai Spear!
